info.title: Functional Area - Read
info.description: The service contains functional area and functional area text nodes.

x-sap-shortText: Read functional area master data using this inbound service

values.text: SAP Analytics Cloud for Planning Integration(SAP_COM_0087)
[Import Connection setup with SAP Analytics Cloud(1YB)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/1YB " Link To BP ")
